full_output.summary: I am a fourth-year Computer Science Engineering student with a strong foundation in Python and C++. I am skilled in implementing data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming principles. I can analyze and solve complex problems using a logical and innovative approach. Committed to continuous learning and staying up-to-date with emerging technologies, I am eager to contribute my skills and passion for programming to a dynamic team.

projects.name: Coup Swap
projects.description: Coup Swap is a Python-based web application developed using Django Framework which aims to share coupons claimed on various online platforms.

projects.name: Parkinsons Disease Detection through Vocal Analysis
projects.description: This research paper suggests a way to detect Parkinsons disease through speech analysis. The study found that machine learning algorithms like SVM, KNN, and RF can accurately detect PD.

projects.name: Learning Management System
projects.description: It helps teachers to identify risk group students, i.e., those who are putting in effort but havent achieved good scores in the midterm. The project is done using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MongoDB.

experiences.description: Developed a web application using Django to share Coupons. Strengthened my understanding of Python web development frameworks and best practices.

full_output.name: Vasavi Kurapati
achievements_and_awards: Abstracted research paper on Disease Prediction using a Machine Learning model.
